title: Kylian Mbappé Twitter Account Hacked to Promote 00 Million Celebrity Crypto Pump-and-Dump
summary: Soccer superstar Kylian Mbappé's official Twitter account was compromised in a sophisticated phishing attack to promote a fraudulent token called MBAPPE to his massive following. The scheme represents an evolution in celebrity-based crypto pump-and-dump operations, where hackers compromise high-profile accounts rather than paying celebrities directly, highlighting the intersection of social media security and crypto fraud.

sources.title: Fame and failure: 7 celebrity-endorsed crypto scams that went wrong
